title: My league broke
body: I was loading up lol when it failed to update so i closed it and it failed to respond. So i closed it in task manager, then when i tried to click back onto it a message pops up saying its not opening correctly. Can someone help me fix this?

replies.body:
When the patcher while it was updating, there may have been a few files that were corrupted in the process causing it to fail. Your best bet would be to use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the repatch option selected. 

Hit me back up if you have any other questions!
